comment.author: 59381334@N06
comment._content: The man's name, his facial features as well as his dress suggest to me that he is from Northern Nigeria, as opposed to Northern Rhodesia which became Zambia after attaining independence in 1964.

comment.author: 60406173@N04
comment._content: The name Ayo Bello is West African too - e.g. Ahmadu Bello university, Nigeria
